扶.definition: to support with the hand; to help sb up; to support oneself by holding onto something; to help

扶不起的阿斗.pinyin: fú bù qǐ de ā dǒu
扶不起的阿斗.definition: weak and inept person; hopeless case

扶乩.definition: planchette writing; to do planchette writing

扶他林.definition: voltaren, a trade name for diclofenac sodium, a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce swelling and as painkiller

扶南.definition: Funan, ancient state in Southeast Asia (1st - 6th century)

扶困濟危.definition: see 濟危扶困|济危扶困[ji4 wei1 fu2 kun4]

扶弟魔.definition: (coll.) (neologism c. 2017, a play on 伏地魔[Fu2 di4 mo2]) woman who devotes herself to supporting her little brother (assisting him with his studies, giving money to help him buy a house etc)

扶弱抑強.definition: to support the weak and restrain the strong (idiom); robbing the rich to help the poor

扶搖直上.definition: to skyrocket; to get quick promotion in one's career

扶桑.definition: Fusang, mythical island of ancient literature, often interpreted as Japan

扶正.definition: to set sth upright or straight; to promote an employee from part-time to full-time (or from deputy to principal); (old) to raise from concubine to wife status

扶正壓邪.definition: to uphold good and suppress evil (idiom)

扶清滅洋.definition: Support the Qing, annihilate the West! (Boxer rebellion slogan)

扶溝.definition: Fugou county in Zhoukou 周口[Zhou1 kou3], Henan

扶溝縣.definition: Fugou county in Zhoukou 周口[Zhou1 kou3], Henan

扶犁.definition: to put one's hand to the plow

扶箕.definition: planchette writing (for taking dictation from beyond the grave); Ouija board

扶綏.definition: Fusui county in Chongzuo 崇左[Chong2 zuo3], Guangxi

扶綏縣.definition: Fusui county in Chongzuo 崇左[Chong2 zuo3], Guangxi

扶老攜幼.definition: taking everyone along, young and old; to look after the elderly and the young

扶貧.definition: assistance to the poor; poverty alleviation

扶貧濟困.definition: to help the poor; almsgiving for the needy; to assist poor households or poor regions

扶風.definition: Fufeng County in Baoji 寶雞|宝鸡[Bao3 ji1], Shaanxi

扶風縣.definition: Fufeng County in Baoji 寶雞|宝鸡[Bao3 ji1], Shaanxi

扶養.definition: to foster; to bring up; to raise

扶餘.definition: variant of 扶餘|扶余 Korean: Buyeo (c. 200 BC-494 AD), ancient kingdom in northeast frontier region of China
